results.content: A good concentrated tutorial on flexbox. However could have used flexbox more in the example layouts.  Responsive navigation could use it to space and center the menu text.  Flexible Cards push the buttons to the bottom of all equal height flex container. Otherwise great focused training on flexbox and using them for common layouts.
results.content_html: A good concentrated tutorial on flexbox. However could have used flexbox more in the example layouts. Responsive navigation could use it to space and center the menu text. Flexible Cards push the buttons to the bottom of all equal height flex container. Otherwise great focused training on flexbox and using them for common layouts.

results.content: If you want to have an in-depth knowledge of Flexbox then this course offers just that. The tutor is very good at explaining everything and responds to questions very quickly.

results.content: This was a very thorough and clear explanation of CSS flexbox, and was exactly what I needed.  I am now confident that I will be able to use flexbox proficiently in my web designs.  Excellent job.
